subtitleNullable: CARLA simulator RBG camera images for 6 objects
descriptionNullable:
CARLA simulator RBG camera images for 6 objects:
1. Vehicles
2. Motorbikes
3. Bikes
4. Traffic lights
5. Traffic signs
6. Pedestrians

The dataset has two label formats:
1. YOLO (.txt)
2. VOC (.xml)

I have developed some scripts to:
1. Convert VOC to YOLO
2. Convert YOLO to VOC
3. Create train and test text files for YOLO neural network
4. Automatically change and define class types for text files (YOLO)

If you need any of the scripts feel free to send me an email at: giorgossav22@gmail.com
If many people find them useful I will upload them publicly somewhere.
